basic.description:
An introduction to French literature from 1600 to 1800 stressing how tensions generated between different ideas within a period determine the aesthetic, philosophical and literary choices made by major authors. Tutorials are devoted to a study of texts by the authors studied during lecture hours.
LEARNING HOURS     240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Introduction à la littérature française

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in FREN110 or a grade of B in (FREN100 or [FREN101 and FREN102]).
